sentences.sContent: As I approached the house, I noticed a light on upstairs.
sentences.sCn: 我走近那幢房子的时候注意到楼上有灯光。
她听到有脚步声走过来。

sentences.sContent: ...the robot's decision and its calculated approach raise an important question: would humans make the same choice...

...When is a scientific approach best embodied in a negotiation according to the man...

...Child experts discourage a one-size-fits-all approach to parenting...

...In its early years the organization operated in an unconventional manner that characterized its innovative and entrepreneurial approach to the industry...
